newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: South Korean Jan-Nov shipbuilding orders fall.
newsitem.headline: South Korean Jan-Nov shipbuilding orders fall.

text.p: South Korean shipyards won orders totalling 4.46 million gross tons for 103 ships in the first 11 months of this year, down from 6.11 million gross tons for 172 ships a year ago, shipbuilders said on Wednesday.

The Korea Shipbuilders' Association said all ships but one were for export. The KSA said ship construction in the 11-month period totalled 6.92 million gross tons for 151 ships, against 4.95 million gross tons for 120 ships a year ago.
The backlog of orders at the end of November was 11.44 million gross tons (257 ships), compared with 13.60 million gross tons (307 ships) a year ago, the association said.
